data.name: Mythic Zombies
data.detailed_description:
Please also note a controller will work with this game but only once in a game. it will not work in menus.


Mythic zombies is a round-based zombie game, where you and up to 7 mates ( 8 player co-op) is tasked with surviving as many rounds as you can of never-ending zombies, Buy Doors, Guns and power-ups to help you in your task, Each round will become hard and hard as you climb the levels with more zombies spawning.

Will you be the first to unlock all of our achievements?


Free DLC and no Microtransactions means you will never be left behind. That's Right, We will be supporting the game with free DLC, And we will never have any Microtransactions.

But Why?
As Gamers, We understand that paying for a game to then pay even more just to play any DLC is truly frustrating and can some times leave people behind and stop them from playing with there buddies, This is why We will support the game with Free Updates and DLC so we know you can play the way you want to.


Every map that comes to Mythic zombies will be 100% Free, We will never charge for maps, We plan to have around 20 maps when the game comes out of early access.



From Day one Mythic zombies will support Single-player, Lan And Online, So play with your mates, Sit back and relax with single-player, You don't even need to be connected online to play single-player so just like the old days, load up the game and start killing zombies.


Within the first six months the game been out we plan to have all zombie and player characters changed as well as full mod support, XP system and guns added. We also plan to update a lot of our 3D models as well.

With each update, we plan to add at least one map and gun.

data.short_description: You and Up-to 7 Friends Take On Round After Round Of Zombies. How Long Can You Survive? Single-Player, Lan and online.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 1300 - i5 2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel UHD Graphics 630 - AMD Radeon R7 (720p low)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 2600 - i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650s - RX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
There is no sexual content or frequent nudity.

This game show body parts been shot/cut off, Arms, Legs and Head are all shown to be shot/cut off
